AccountTerritoryAssignmentRuleItem.name: AccountTerritoryAssignmentRuleItem
AccountTerritoryAssignmentRuleItem.description: A row of selection criteria for an AccountTerritoryAssignmentRule object. Available if Sales Territories has been enabled.

Field.description: The standard or custom account field to use as a criteria.

Operation.description: The criteria to apply, such as “equals” or “starts with.”

SortOrder.description: The order in which this row is evaluated compared to other AccountTerritoryAssignmentRuleItem objects for the given AccountTerritoryAssignmentRule.

Value.description: The field value(s) to evaluate, such as 94105 if the Field is Billing Zip/Postal Code.
